label: TransportSettingTemperature
comment: Temperature settings for a transport movement, such as a required storage temperature range.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of transport setting temperature [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 6245].

objectProperties.comment: Temperature setting related information of an instructive nature.

referencedBy.comment: A transport related temperature setting applicable to these handling instructions.
A temperature setting for this piece of associated transport equipment, such as storage temperature or operational temperature.
The transport temperature setting for this supply chain consignment item.
